body:
@ianlancetaylor, misc/cgo/test/issue7665.go uses the non-standard way of
declaring
the export function.

If my understanding of the cgo compilation procedure is correct, one can't
use exported
functions correctly within the same Go file, due to the chicken and egg
problem I mentioned
earlier.

For gc, if you declare the exported function in cgo preamble, it happens to
work.
